description: This file is a Dart test file that demonstrates the usage of the mocktail package for mocking and testing the UserService interface within a Flutter testing environment.

classes.name: UserService
classes.description: An abstract class representing a user service with a method fetchGreeting, used as a contract for mocking.

classes.name: MockUserService
classes.description: A mock implementation of UserService created using mocktail's Mock class.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The test runner main function grouping tests for MockUserService using flutter_test and mocktail.
